column1: This is a question game. You have to answer the questions asked.
You have to answer all questions correctly to get to the end.
How many wheels does a bicycle have?
What does 'GG' mean in the gamer community?
What's the answer to all questions according to the movie "hitchhiker's guide to the galaxy"?

Congratulation! You did it! You finished the game. Sadly there is no price. But you can be proud of yourself. You proved that you have a lot of patience. This patience is worth a lot. It will bring you further in live :) Have a good one and never quit exploring.
Too bad. That was wrong! You gotta start all over again :(
